item.title: Using Apillon's Web3 storage to save JSON form data
item.description: Introduction Brief introduction to the technologies used (Vite, React, TypeScript, Apillon Hosting, REST API). The purpose of the tutorial: to create a web form that saves data to Apillon Hosting. Setting Up the Project Creating the Project with Vite and TypeScript First, let’s create a new project using Vite with TypeScript. Open your terminal and run the following commands: npm create vite@latest my-react-app --template react-ts cd my-react-app Updating package.json Scripts Next, update your package.
